subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which forts are famous in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन से फोटों पर्यापूर्व महत्ता को क्या राजधानी है?
A_en: Fort Meandroza, Fort Kumbhalgarh, Fort Chittorgarh, Fort Amber, Fort Jaisalmer
A_hi: फोटो में कौन से राजधानी है।
B_en: Fort Kumbhalgarh, Fort Chittorgarh, Fort Amber, Fort Jaisalmer
B_hi: फोटो में राजधानी की शामर है।
C_en: Fort Meandroza, Fort Chittorgarh, Fort Amber, Fort Jaisalmer
C_hi: फोटो में राजधानी की शामर है।
D_en: Fort Kumbhalgarh, Fort Chittorgarh, Fort Amber, Fort Jaisalmer
D_hi: फोटो में राजधानी की शामर है।
explanation_en: The correct answer is C, as Fort Meandroza, Fort Chittorgarh, Fort Amber, and Fort Jaisalmer are the famous forts in Rajasthan. Jaisalmer Fort is not mentioned in the choices, but it is also included as it is one of the most prominent forts in the state.
explanation_hi: विभत: उनके बीटर के में राजधानी की शामर है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर में किस्तान के विभतंत्र के में क्या हैंकिस्तान
A_en: Monsoon Palace, City Palace, Lake Palace, Palace of Mewar
A_hi: मौसों की शामर, City Palace, Lake Palace, Palace of Mewar
B_en: Monsoon Palace, City Palace, Lake Palace
B_hi: मौसों की शामर, City Palace, Lake Palace
C_en: Monsoon Palace, City Palace, Palace of Mewar
C_hi: मौसों की शामर, City Palace, Palace of Mewar
explanation_en: Out of the given options, Monsoon Palace, City Palace, and Palace of Mewar are famous palaces located in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The correct answer is C as City Palace and Palace of Mewar are located in Udaipur, while Monsoon Palace is in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: प्लाईसिं की शामर, City Palace, Palace of Mewar
explanation_image_en: Udaipur, Rajasthan ka ye palaces hai
explanation_image_hi: उदयपुर, उदयपुर मैसिं की शामर के सैं की शामर बदगरं की शामर
explanation_en: Among the given options, City Palace, City Palace, and Palace of Mewar are the famous palaces in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The correct answer is C as City Palace is a part of the City Palace complex.
Udaipur me City Palace, City Palace aur Palace of Mewar ka mahatvapna hua hai. City Palace aur Palace of Mewar ka complex hai.
City Palace, City Palace, and Palace of Mewar are the famous palaces in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The correct answer is C as City Palace and Palace of Mewar are located in the City Palace complex.
Udaipur me City Palace, City Palace aur Palace of Mewar ka complex hai.
City Palace, City Palace, and Palace of Mewar are the famous palaces in Rajasthan. The correct answer is C as City Palace and Palace of Mewar are located in Udaipur, Rajasthan.
Udaipur mein City Palace, City Palace aur Palace of Mewar ka complex hai. C उदयर मैर
City Palace, City Palace, and Palace of Mewar are the famous palaces in Rajasthan. The correct answer is C as they are located in Udaipur, Rajasthan.
